description: CHANGE OF USE FROM RETAIL WITH RESTAURANT/CAFE TO RETAIL WITH RESTAURANT/CAFE AND ANCILLARY TAKEAWAY SALES
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: EX01A, PL01C, Appendix 1 Rational ovens technical specifications, Appendix 2 Ultravent technical specifications, Operational Management Plan, Planning Statement Dated 22/08/19, Servicing and Waste Management Plan

Condition : 3 - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The use of Class A1, A3 and A5 hereby permitted shall operate only between the hours of 0600 to 2200 hours on Mondays to Fridays and 0700 to 2100 hours on Saturdays, Sundays, Bank and Public holidays

Condition : 5 - The premises shall only be used for Use Class A1, A3 and A5and for no other purpose, (including any other purpose within the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes Order) 1987), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification.

Condition : 6 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:


   ii) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
